content: * *Peter Preiser** is chair of the School of Biological Sciences and a professor of [molecular genetics](/wiki/Molecular_genetics) and [cell biology](/wiki/Cell_biology) at the [Nanyang Technological University](/wiki/Nanyang_Technological_University) (NTU) in Singapore. He specialises in the study of the [malaria parasite](/wiki/Malaria_parasite) and is head of the team at NTU that has discovered a route to a possible vaccine for the disease. - "Peter R Preiser - Nanyang Technological University (ntu)". *ResearchGate*. Retrieved 17 November 2017. This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Peter Preiser
